product_name: The North Face Varius Guide Pants - Men's Regular
long_description: The North Face Varius Guide men's pants feature breathable, waterproof protection to keep you dry and warm during wet and windy backcountry outings. Two-layer pants are made from HyVent(R) nylon for durable, waterproof protection; nylon taffeta lining slides comfortably over base layers. All seams are sealed for weathertight protection. Full-length, two-way side zippers offer easy on/off over footwear. Rip-and-stick waist closure adjusts the fit; brushed waistband lining is warm and soft, and wicks moisture. Removable, adjustable, elastic suspenders offer a secure fit; feature easy-to-use front-only connectors. Internal gaiters with elastic grippers seal out elements; reinforced inner ankles resist abrasion. The North Face Varius Guide pants feature two hand pockets and a thigh pocket.
short_description: The North Face Varius Guide men's pants feature breathable, waterproof protection to keep you dry and warm during wet and windy backcountry outings.
